title: Strengthening Deep Learning Competencies: Problem-Based Learning Program for Women Professional Chef Uniform Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Workwear pattern base blocks can be developed by analyzing target customers' physical dimensions and functional requirements
Design concept boards can be mathematically expressed by applying the FEA model (functional-aesthetic-expressive elements)
Dimensional errors occurring during prototype production can be measured and calibrated

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
